name: Mound of the Dead
description:
Story

Benjamin Harrod, the world-renowned archaeologist, is called all the way to Pakistan to the ancient civilization of Moenjodaro.

The recent floods in Pakistan have devastated the site and there is a high chance that the ruins will be nowhere if necessary steps are not taken.

The archeologist is visiting the site to preserve the remains of the oldest civilization but he found things that he cannot imagine.

How to Play

WASD for Movement
Left Click for Attack

Credits

Syed Daniyal Ali       Developer and Level Designer
Taha Murtaza Ali      Artist and UI Designer


This game has been developed for the Ephiphany Developer's Game jam Bird edition.
